subject: Dear Valued Customer
body:
Dear Valued Customer
Attn:  
We are at a very serious time, and your maximum cooperation is very
important. I am not focused on the fee. While our correspondent bank is
now in the process of loading your fund in a high profile ATM VISA CARD,
you should reconfirm your below details to avoid mistake.
Your name:
Home address:
Phone Number:
MICHAEL SMITH
MANAGING DIRECTOR
STANDARD CHARTERED BANK.
FOREIGN REMITTANCE DEPARTMENT
1 BASINGHALL AVENUE LONDON,EC2V 5DD
EMAIL: 
info@scbaccuk.com

subject: Re:   Dear Valued Customer
body:
Dear Michael Smith,

Thank you for your email. I understand the importance of this matter and I am ready to cooperate fully. However, before proceeding, could you please provide more details about the fund and how it came to be in my name? This is important for my records.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Robert
